name: RenderWare 4 3D Model
summary: Learn about .RW4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Some Electronic Arts video games released in the late 2000s and early 2010s use the RenderWare 4 graphics engine to load and show graphics to players. 3D models used by the RenderWare 4 graphics engine are saved as RW4 files.
Most prominently, Spore and SimCity (2013) use the RenderWare 4 graphics engine. Modders of these games have created tools that allow them to open and examine RW4 files' contents.

instructions: You can open an RW4 file and examine some of its contents in the following modding tools:
When opening an RW4 file, be sure to open it in a related modding tool. For example, open a Spore RW4 file in a Spore tool, and a SimCity RW4 file in a SimCity tool.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
